p: RAW264.7 cells were seeded in 24-well plates (4 × 10 5 cells/well) and cultured overnight. The cells were pre-treated with HDE for 1 h and then treated with 50 µg/ml oxLDL for 24 h. The culture supernatants were collected for the measurement of IL-6 levels using the ELISA kit (88-7064, Invitrogen) according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
